item.title: Goodbye BlogEngine.NET
item.description: It's been a good 6 years of using BlogEngine.NET, but it was time to move on.

item.title: 12 years of posts = a lot of comments
item.description: 12 years of posts/articles means I've got a slew of comments, and I'll be touching almost every single one as I migrate completely to DISQUS.

item.title: BlogEngine.NET 1.6 released
item.description: BlogEngine.NET 1.6 is available for download. Too bad the memory footprint increased again.

item.title: Determine BlogEngine.NET comments that haven't been published - with LINQPad
item.description: Find all BlogEngine.NET posts with unapproved comments using this code and LINQPad.

item.title: Determine BlogEngine.NET comments that haven't been published
item.description: C# code to parse a directory of BlogEngine.NET posts (determined by the user selecting one) for unapproved comments.

item.title: BlogEngine.NET running on Cassini Personal Web Server
item.description: Cassini Personal Web Server may just be what you need to quickly work with BlogEngine.NET for extension and theme creation.

item.title: New site theme - watercircles
item.description: Watercircles, a new theme for BlogEngine.NET, is now in use on my site.

item.title: New BlogEngine.NET Theme: 20081126
item.description: I created a new theme for BlogEngine.NET, my first with the new widgets functionality.

item.title: James Skemp's BlogEngine.NET themes
item.description: A listing of themes I've adapted for use with BlogEngine.NET.

item.title: BlogEngine.NET 1.4 - Memory usage spike?
item.description: Is BlogEngine.NET starting to suffer from feature creep?

item.title: BlogEngine 1.3 upgrade issues
item.description: For whatever reason, when I upgraded to BlogEngine 1.3, all of the permissions on my site vanished. [slnet0514:e8115c76-8306-4aaa-9bbe-66b3f72cec25]

item.title: BlogEngine.NET Theme - MWRT-002
item.description: James Skemp is proud to present MWRT-002, a theme for BlogEngine.NET.

item.title: Template changed again (October 2007)
item.description: Royal Flowers is now the template for StrivingLife.

item.title: Swan Dive updated for BlogEngine.NET 1.2 release
item.description: With the release of BlogEngine.NET 1.2, I've updated Swan Dive.
